title: Welcome
body_text: This is the first slide of the first carousel. Each carousel is identified by its carousel_id.

title: Key Concept
body_text: The carousel_id column groups slides together into a single carousel.
Use different carousel_id values to create multiple separate carousels in one CSV file.

title: Design Tips
body_text: This is a different carousel (tips_series) in the same CSV file.

title: Best Practices
body_text: Keep text concise | Use high contrast colors | Maintain consistent spacing | Test on mobile
Good design is as little design as possible.
subtitle: Dieter Rams

body_text: of users engage more with visual content than text-only posts
subtitle: Engagement Rate

title: 10x
body_text: higher retention rate for carousel posts vs single images
subtitle: Retention Boost

body_text: Visual storytelling is the future of social media.
